isis.stitle: DT 466 / DT 570 / HT 570 Service Manual - 2004 Emissions with EGR - Fuel System - Installation - Priming Fuel System After Out of Fuel

svcproc.title: Priming Fuel System After Out of Fuel

figure.caption: Fuel filter components and schrader valve

calloutgroup.callout1: Fuel valve assembly (air bleed and pressure test port)

warning.para: To avoid personal injury, possible death or damage to the engine or vehicle, make sure the transmission is in neutral, parking brake is set and wheels are blocked before doing diagnostic or service procedures on engine or vehicle.

caution.para: Do not add fuel to the fuel filter header, this can add contaminates to the fuel.

svcproc.para: If the engine runs out of fuel, do the following:

step1.para: Set parking brake and place transmission control lever to NEUTRAL or PARK.
Unlock the fuel primer pump assembly by turning the knob counter-clockwise.
Fill the fuel filter header with fuel by pumping the fuel primer pump.
To aid in filling the fuel filter header and bleed the fuel rail, do the following:

item.para: Bleed the fuel rail by pressing down on the stem of the schrader valve and pumping the fuel primer pump until fuel starts coming out of the schrader valve.
Once the air has bled out of the fuel rail, release the stem of the schrader valve and push the fuel primer pump a couple of more times.
Push the fuel primer pump in one more time and turn the knob clockwise to lock in place.

step1.para: Refer to specific starting procedures in the Engine Operation and Maintenance Manual.
